alert.note: Alert for East Cameron; Lower Iberia; Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Lower Vermilion; Upper St. Mary; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 16 at 3:00PM CST until January 17 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 10 above zero. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Louisiana and southeast Texas. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The advisory area has been extended to the coast with this issuance, although locations closest to the immediate coast will likely not experience wind chills at or below the advisory criteria.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: East Cameron; Lower Iberia; Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Lower Vermilion; Upper St. Mary; West Cameron
